languages.text: When the character's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g} deal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to targets other than their main target, they gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночный{/g} выстрел персонажа наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} неосновной цели, персонаж получает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g} до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: When the character's single shots deal damage to targets other than their main target, they gain +5 Ballistic Skill until the end of combat.

languages.text: Cuando un ataque de {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}disparo único{/g} del personaje inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a un objetivo que no sea el objetivo principal, gana +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} hasta el final del combate.

traits.locale_text: Cuando un ataque de disparo único del personaje inflige daño a un objetivo que no sea el objetivo principal, gana +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: このキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}単発射撃{/g}がメイン対象以外の対象に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えた時、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}を+5獲得する。

traits.locale_text: このキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}単発射撃{/g}がメイン対象以外の対象に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えた時、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}を+5獲得する。

languages.text: 当角色的{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}单发射击{/g}对主要目标之外的目标造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，该角色的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}提高5点，效果持续至战斗结束。

traits.locale_text: 当角色的单发射击对主要目标之外的目标造成伤害时，该角色获得+5{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschüsse{/g} des Charakters anderen Zielen als seinem Hauptziel {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zufügen, erhält er bis zum Ende des Kampfes +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistische Fähigkeit{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the character's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g} deal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to targets other than their main target, they gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Wenn die Einzelschüsse des Charakters anderen Zielen als seinem Hauptziel Schaden zufügen, erhält er bis zum Ende des Kampfes +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistische Fähigkeit{/g}.

languages.text: Lorsque les tirs {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}au coup par coup{/g} du personnage infligent des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à des cibles autres que sa cible principale, un bonus de +5 s'applique à sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: Karakterin {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}tek atışları{/g}, ana hedefi haricindeki hedeflere her {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verdiğinde karakter +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} kazanır. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
